post:
Hello,

Recently I started a new provider based service with a new Motto - Define cheap. I`ve been in this business for almost 5 years now, of course with high end services. A new challange for this great Year of 2015 is to build up a solid hosting company with low end boxes/prices.

I am looking forward to meet new customers, and also wait for reviews.
Services start from $3.5/Month. 

Vps landing page = http://vpsx.ro/vps.html
Dedicated landing page = http://vpsx.ro/servers.html
Contact = http://vpsx.ro/contact.html

For example Vps starter package includes 1 cpu core, 768 mb ram, 75 gb ssd drive, and one ipv4 usable ip. This comes at a fair price of $3.5/Month


Faith without fear ..... :)
